name: integration-tests
description: Integration test for the entire monorepo

scripts.container-start: echo 'container starting' && docker compose --env-file environments/env.base up -d
scripts.integrations: yarn run container-start && yarn run integrations-citizen && yarn run integrations-rc
scripts.container-stop: echo 'container stopping' && docker compose --env-file environments/env.base down
scripts.env-generate-cosmosdb: echo 'generating cosmosdb environment' && dotenv -e environments/env.base envsub environments/env.cosmosdb environments/generated/env.cosmosdb
scripts.env-generate-rc-func: echo 'generating rc-func environment' && dotenv -e environments/env.base envsub environments/env.rc-func environments/generated/env.rc-func
scripts.env-generate-citizen-func: echo 'generating citizen-func environment' && dotenv -e environments/env.base envsub environments/env.citizen-func environments/generated/env.citizen-func
scripts.env-generate-testagent-rc-func: echo 'generating testagent-rc-func' && dotenv -e environments/env.base envsub environments/env.testagent-rc-func environments/generated/env.testagent-rc-func
scripts.env-generate-testagent-citizen-func: echo 'generating testagent-citizen-func' && dotenv -e environments/env.base envsub environments/env.testagent-citizen-func environments/generated/env.testagent-citizen-func
scripts.env-generate: mkdir environments/generated & yarn run env-generate-cosmosdb & yarn run env-generate-rc-func & yarn run env-generate-citizen-func & yarn run env-generate-testagent-rc-func & yarn run env-generate-testagent-citizen-func
